data.name: [SFDC-440] Add Flex Tracker Checkbox Field
data.notes:
Name:
Leslie Onley  

Email Address:
leslie.onley@safetyservicescompany.com  

Department Represented:
CUST - Client Success  

Impact:
New Process or Feature  

Type of Request:
Salesforce  

Salesforce Ticket Type:
Feature  

Associated Page:
Account Page  

Requesting a New Field:
Yes  

Function of New Field:
To allow us to select a checkbox that will indicate if an account has Flex Tracker.  

User Story:
As a user, I want to be able to select a checkbox anytime a client has Flex Tracker associated with their Veriforce account. There is no contract associated with this specific item, so we need to be able to manually select this option. I would like it to be in the same field as the Site Tracker checkbox.  

Acceptance Criteria:
A checkbox that can be selected and/or deselected by the user.  

Proposed Name for Checkbox:
Flex Tracker checkbox  

Additional Context:
N/A  

----------------------------------------

data.name: [SFDC-442] Link NSC Product Code to Quote Line Item Level
data.notes:
*Name:*
Ben Gores
*Email address:*
[ben.gores@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:[ben.gores@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:ben.gores@safetyservicescompany.com]]
*Which Department are you representing?:*
FULF - Fulfillment
*What kind of Impact is this having?:*
New Process or Feature
*What type of request is this?:*
Salesforce
*What kind of Salesforce Ticket is this?:*
Feature
*What type of page is associated with this feature?:*
Quote
*Are you requesting a new field?:*
No
*User Story:*
As a member of the Fulfillment team I need the "Poster State" from the Quote Level and the "NSC Product Code" from the product level to be available on the same report. Currently this is not possible because the Poser state only exists on the quote and the NSC product code only exists on the opportunity level. 
*Acceptance Criteria:*
The Quote Line Item level currently has two fields called "NSC product code (English)" and "NSC product code (Spanish)" See attached screen shot. However, there is no information available to populate these fields. Also, these fields are redundant. Eliminate "NSC product code (Spanish". Rename "NSC product code (english)" as "NSC product code". Then Link the "NSC Product Code" information from the product level onto the Quote Line Item Level in the "NSC product code" field. 
*What should we call this?:*
Linking "NSC Product Code" to Quote Line Item Level. 
*Additional Context:*
This is a medium priority. I have a work around by joining a quote report and  Opportunity report. 
———————————————

[https://form.asana.com/?k=fiideHFJeymhykmEGYMuNg&d=169426931772429]

data.name: [SFDC-441] Add Meeting Contract Fields
data.notes:
*Name:*
Ben Gores
*Email address:*
[ben.gores@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:[ben.gores@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:ben.gores@safetyservicescompany.com]]
*Which Department are you representing?:*
FULF - Fulfillment
*What kind of Impact is this having?:*
New Process or Feature
*What type of request is this?:*
Salesforce
*What kind of Salesforce Ticket is this?:*
Feature
*What type of page is associated with this feature?:*
Contract
*Are you requesting a new field?:*
Yes
*What is the function of this new field?:*
1) Trade Code for meetings
2) Full or Half Year for meetings
3) Year Level (1-5)
4) # of Selection sheets (1-5)
*User Story:*
As a member of the fulfillment team I currently receive daily sales reports that include the fields above. I need the information from these fields in order to fulfill daily meeting orders. 
*Acceptance Criteria:*
The information for these columns gets entered after the sale, so it should be added to the meetings contract. Ideally these would all be dropdown menus. If this needs to be completed fast and dirty they can be free form fields that Customer Service and enter manually. 
*What should we call this?:*
New fields on contract object for meetings 
*Additional Context:*
This is needed in order to move Fulfillment into production in SF. 
———————————————

data.name: [SFDC-438] Fix Quote Discount Sync Issue
data.notes:
*Name:*
Justin Bilodeau
*Email address:*
[justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:[justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com]]
*Which Department are you representing?:*
SALE - Sales
*What kind of Impact is this having?:*
Broken (Revenue Impacting)
*What type of request is this?:*
Salesforce
*What kind of Salesforce Ticket is this?:*
Bug
*What is the expected result?:*
Discount amounts from quote line items to properly map to opportunity line items
*What is preventing this result?:*
opportunity appears to be syncing too much or too little for discount amount when syncing to opportunity
*User Story:*
As a Salesforce user, I want all amounts from my quote to properly sync to my opportunity to submit for approval
*Acceptance Criteria:*
Create new quote on opportunity
Add applicable line items and discount $ amounts to quote
Click Sync Quote button
Quote line items and amounts will sync to opportunity line items and amounts
Opportunity totals will match quote totals
No dollar amounts are changed when sale is submitted for approval
*What should we call this?:*
Quote Discount amount not syncing properly
*Additional Context:*
This is the original opportunity which was syncing with $200 too little for discount:
[https://safetyservicescompany.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Opportunity/006Ub00000NrLZAIA3/view]
This is the opportunity I attempted to recreate to see if the issue is fixed and now it is apply $200 too much for discount:
[https://safetyservicescompany.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Opportunity/006Ub00000NrLZAIA3/view]
It appears when you are adding a duplicate product multiple times, it will only save the information for one of those product and duplicate it across any other instances of it in the opportunity line items (the item with pockets quantity 5 should be discounted $550 and the item with pockets quantity 25 should be discounted $750 but the opp is only saving one discount amount and duplicating it)
———————————————
This task was submitted through *IT & Engineering Ticket Form*
[https://form.asana.com/?k=fiideHFJeymhykmEGYMuNg&d=169426931772429]
Created from Asana: [[SSCSF-705] Quote Discount amount not syncing properly|https://app.asana.com/0/0/1210025918710044/f]

data.name: [SFDC-433] Fix Avalara Sales Tax Discount Calculation
data.notes:
Name:
Laura Whetter

Email address:
lwhetter@verifiedfirst.com

Which Department are you representing?:
Finance

What kind of Impact is this having?:
Broken (Revenue Impacting)

What type of request is this?:
Salesforce

What kind of Salesforce Ticket is this?:
Bug

What is the expected result?:
Sales tax calculates on the line item after discount

What is preventing this result?:
A possible change to the discount or subtotal field

User Story:
As a finance user, I need the sales tax calculated by Avalara to read from the Subtotal (Unit total less discount).

Acceptance Criteria:
Once the sales tax is calculating from the Line Item Total (and considering the discount amount).

What should we call this?:
Sales Tax Calculation Bug (Not Considering Discount)

Additional Context:
Example of Invoice (in Production) where sale tax is calculating from the unit price and not the line item total.

data.name: [SFDC-430] Fix Quote Sync Error With Opportunities
data.notes:
*Name:*
Justin Bilodeau
*Email address:*
[justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:[justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com]]
*Which Department are you representing?:*
Sales
*What kind of Impact is this having?:*
Broken (Revenue Impacting)
*What type of request is this?:*
Salesforce
*What kind of Salesforce Ticket is this?:*
Bug
*What is the expected result?:*
Opportunity Quotes should be able to be synced with primary opportunity
*What is preventing this result?:*
Error generating stating a specific object has already been synced to the opportunity within the same instance
*User Story:*
As a sales agent, I want to sync my quote with my opportunity so that I can submit the sale for processing.
*Acceptance Criteria:*
Opportunity needs to be or have been created
New quote needs to be created on the opportunity
Line items need to be added to the quote
From the quote click the 'Start Sync' button 
Quote will sync with opportunity and populate quote information to the main opportunity page
*What should we call this?:*
Error message not allowing quotes to be synced with open opportunity
*Additional Context:*
Error message that generates appears to be a different instance of the same custom object type each time (screenshots and video attached). Error message references object ID '00kUb00000CXXX' where 'XXX' is the variable value but '00kUb00000C' is the same for each error generated.
———————————————

data.name: [SFDC-427] Convert Discount Currency to Percentage for Opportunity Calculation
data.notes: An opportunity’s Amount is dependent on the Total Price which is calculated on the basis of the discount percentage so we will convert the discount (currency) on the quote line items to percentage and populate it in the discount (percentage) field on the quote line items which will the be automatically get populated on the opportunity products and hence the correct Amount will be populated on the opportunity.

data.name: [SFDC-434] Fix synced quote amounts not matching opportunity amounts
data.notes:
*Name:*
Justin Bilodeau
*Email address:*
[justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:[justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com|mailto:justin.bilodeau@safetyservicescompany.com]]
*Which Department are you representing?:*
Client Success
*What kind of Impact is this having?:*
Broken (Revenue Impacting)
*What type of request is this?:*
Salesforce
*What kind of Salesforce Ticket is this?:*
Bug
*What is the expected result?:*
Opportunity Amount and Grand Total should match the synced quote
*What is preventing this result?:*
Amounts on the quote object do not match the amounts on the opportunity object
*User Story:*
As a salesforce user I want the quote amounts to match the amounts on the opportunity when synced so that opportunities can be closed/won
*Acceptance Criteria:*
When line items are added to quote and discounts have been applied, click option to Start Sync
Once synced, amounts on the quote should match the discount, grand total and amount field on the opportunity
When opportunity for sale is submitted, prices should remain matched with quote
*What should we call this?:*
Synced quote amounts not matching amounts on opportunity
*Additional Context:*
This previously was working properly previously from a hot fix but appears to not be functioning properly again
Opp example:
[https://safetyservicescompany.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Opportunity/006Ub00000LMZn0IAH/view]
